_header: Ye good men at your ballads reads [Yhe gude men at yir bulletis redis]
_description: On the Nine Worthies — one couplet

CamCCC171.Transcription:
Yhe gude men at yir bulletes redis Deme ȝe qwha dochtrast was in
                    dedis

EDU186.Transcription:
Ȝe gude men þat yir bulletis redis deme quha dochtyast was
                    in dedis
